Description:
---------------------
FIFA Manager 11 includes a long list of new features. The game has undergone many improvements in general, with special emphasis on areas of greatest importance. It also includes a separate online mode, introduced in the previous version, in which up to 8 players can battle over the Internet.
The manager continues to have full management control of the football club. In the game, you are responsible for the lineup, tactics and team training, as well as recruitment of new players and improvements to the club and the stadium. Among the most notable is the FIFA 3D engine, over 13,000 images of original players, the administration of player, the administration of the national team, create a club mode and Forecast party tool.
